Articles.Content: I am excited to see the Interstellar flights and also colonies, there is not so much games where you can fly to another star universe and colonise some of its planets
I want to see all the new ways I can colonise and travel the different celestial bodys!
I’m looking forward to building colonies on other planets and using them to build massive ships off-world.
I'm super excited for the multiplayer, I'm excited to work with friends who are outside the Aerospace interest bubble but definitely have creativity and motivations to create.
Ultimately, everything! Multiplayer, better vanilla graphics, colonization, interstellar, new parts! It's gonna be so cool. Colonization barely ekes out the top spot for me, but not by much!
I want cooler physics, improved graphics and additional star systems

Explosions. 
 

Better explosions. 
 

MOAR! explosions! 
 

ALL. THE. EXPLOSIONS!!1

that’s what I’m exited for.
I'm excited for colonies. Being able to have resource management for "unloaded" vehicles is going to be amazing. Hello permanent mining colony!

MM free gamies gib for me yes...

Excited for explosions.

I'm excited about getting to know how resource gathering and transfering is going to work. It is the key for colonies and many of those interactions will have to be automatized in order to reach out further into the solar system and then go interstellar. SUPER EXCITED!!!
I'm excited for multiplayer! it's going to be awesome playing with friends!

I would love to see the other star systems in KSP 2. I also like the UI and the planets in KSP 2. I also would love to compare the differences even though KSP 2 looks very different from KSP 1. Tomorrow, KSP 2 will be released.
I'm most excited to play in multiplayer, for the new colony system and to make my own mod for KSP2

I'm not sure if I'll start playing it immediately, but for sure I'll be grateful if I win :3
And yeah, I'm for sure waiting for the colonization system with resource gathering

Edited February 23, 2023 by Dejnn

Personally I'm most excited about being able to change the colour of parts - I think it'll dramatically increase the visual quality of all the things we build and make it so much easier to build colourful things. (Not like in KSP1 where we had to either install buggy mods or import a ton of custom flags)

Also congratulations in advance to the winners of this - You're very lucky to not have to buy KSP2!
I'm excited to see how Jeb dies for the first time (again). I wonder if he'll think "oh no, not again!"

Accessibility is the feature I'm most thrilled about;

As a father of a 2 year old, I can't wait to use KSP2 to play together in a way that I did with my dad.
At first with him spectating, playing with the controls and watching the animations.
Then, after a few years, learning from the animations and make the first attempts at building and piloting his own crafts. All while guiding him.
And finally playing together in multiplayer, him guiding his old man..
I'm excited for multiplayer, it's gonna be a ton of fun flying around with my friends!
I excited for multiplayer, colonies, orbital vehicle construction and new surface of the planets
I'm looking forward to travelling to multiple star systems with my freinds in multiplayer
Interstellar, More Parts (for building complex space stations), Colonies, Debdeb, Tutorials, Performance, and the new UI!
Excited to build multiple modules in parallel in the VAB instead of monkeying with subassemblies.
I'm super excited to finally be able to go interstellar
I'm excited to build nice rovers, ove the new 2nd biggst rover wheels aready!
I'm excited for game engine rework, hopefully the game will be much more stable and kraken-free
